manifest.install: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_vivawjw_lkcx`; CREATE TABLE `ims_vivawjw_lkcx` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `uniacid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `proof` text, `pictinfo` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `sittime` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `time` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `status` int(1) DEFAULT '2', `turndown` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `uid` (`uid`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `ims_vivawjw_lkcx_sc`; CREATE TABLE `ims_vivawjw_lkcx_sc` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `dwbh` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `wzms` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2556 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
